item.description:
Specific Topic: Repair Your Past, Create Your Future

On this evening, we will explore the NLP concept of a Time Line and how it can be used.  the time line is a conceptual way in which our sub conscious orders and organizes memories (and thoughts of future events).

We will have at least one group and one individual demo.

learn how:

  • The subconscious interprets time
  • We each have individual ways of representing time
  • To regress using the time line
  • To progress with any goal you may have

 

Time Line Therapy, also known as Mental/Emotional Release is a form of therapy using the time line concept.  It can be used for regressing to the past and progressing to the future.  It's applications are both in therapy and personal development.


Come Learn and Play!!

 


Our Monthly Hypnosis/NLP Meetup in Methuen. Learn/Experience/Share techniques and strategies to help yourself or others overcome fears, phobias, negative emotions, illnesses, and many others, as well as to become the person you always wanted to be.

Kevin Martin 866.837.2133 kenda_assoc@msn.com www.poseffects.com

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: Methuen - Repair Your Past, Create Your Future
